kashcool.name: Kashcool
kashcool.description: Kashcool is an educational platform with an interactive content for kuwait curricula...
kashcool.details:
Interact with the book content in an interesting educational experience, using innovative studying means anywhere and anytime directly from the tablet, iPad, or computer.

Kashcool is the product of educational and technological experiences. It is the greatest educational platform in Kuwait, which provides the interactive educational sources. It contains an impressive collection of educational electronic books with the latest educational means, designed or the Kuawiti curriculum from grade k-1 (elementary) to grade -12 (secondary). It takes you to new educational fields that enable you to access all the lessons and information with one click.

toe.name: Project Toe
toe.description: Safe & anonymous place for you to express how you’re really feeling your feelings to a supportive community of over 70,000 people...
toe.details:
Safe & anonymous place for you to express how you’re really feeling your feelings to a supportive community of over 70,000 people.

You can talk to about your problems with people who understand you, or you can use your own experience to help those going through something similar.

It’s the best way to meet new friends while helping others. No longer will you ever feel alone.
